specs.Oscillators: 1 VCO (independent levels for saw, square/pulse/pwm and sub-oscillator)
specs.LFO: triangle, square, random and noise waveforms
specs.Filter: resonant, self-oscillating LPF, mod by EG, lfo and kybd tracking
specs.VCA: ADSR, mod by EG or gate
specs.Arpeg/Seq: Digital sequencer up to 100 steps record/playback; Arpeggiator patterns: up, down, up/down

specs.Sounds: 14 tones: Kick, Snare, Rim, Cow Bell, HiHats, Cymbals, Congas, Bongos, Tambourine, Guiros
